publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6247 Dave Thompson: Buckie Thistle, 2010 Highland League Championsâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Buckie Thistle on its success at being crowned Highland League Champions 2010; notes that this is its first Highland League title since 1958, winning 3-0 against Wick on Saturday 1 May 2010; hails this as a historic achievement for the town and club, which adds further testimony to a strong showing from Highland football over recent weeks, and finally wishes these dedicated players, who train evenings and weekends in addition to full-time jobs, the best of luck in their last game against Brora. Supported by: Rob Gibson*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bill Kidd*, Nigel Don*
S3M-6247 Buckie Thistle, 2010 Highland League Champions (lodged on 4 May 2010) Alasdair Allan*, Stuart McMillan*, Robin Harper*, Brian Adam*
